title: Would I Serve the Eucharist to Jordan Peterson and Tom Holland? PVK Q/A June 18 2021
description:
0:00-4:20 Intro
4:20-14:35 Anarchism vs Christian Anarchism Michael Malice and Jordan Peterson videos this week
14:36-59:35 Would Jordan Peterson and Tom Holland be welcome to partake of Communion at Living Stones CRC? 
59:36-1:15:19 Did God answer my prayer and heal my porn addiction? 
1:15:20-2:15:00 Silence, Trees, Fatherhood

Questions in PVK Q/A https://discord.gg/gPGMbJzH

Weekly Q/A on the Bridges of Meaning Discord Server, Fridays at 10am Pacific Time. 

Join us on Discord https://discord.gg/7Ss3UpTX


Discord link. Good for just a few days. Check with more recent videos for a fresh link. https://discord.gg/6WsCpzWk

Vanderklips channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCX0jIcadtoxELSwehCh5QTg
